titleStmt.title: Information for Mr. Alexander Heriot Minister at Dalkeith. In relation to the lybel against him, before the Presbyterie at Dalkeith, and the sentences thereon. And petitions to the lords of their Majesties Privy Council the appeal given in by the said Mr. Alexander Heriot to the synod of Midlothian, containing a short information of the progress of that process, to that time, is as follows.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, with some loss of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
